enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve writing to an OutputStreamWriter, which can be reused for setting up the output stream.
The bigTitle method is used to format titles similarly to how titles are formatted in the render method.
The title method is used to format titles similarly to how titles are formatted in the render method.
The listEndpoints method is invoked within the render method to list different types of endpoints, indicating a dependency on the state set up by listEndpoints.
The ol_changed method is invoked within the render method to list changed operations, indicating a dependency on the state set up by ol_changed.
The HttpStatus.getReasonPhrase method is used within the render method to get reason phrases for HTTP status codes, indicating a dependency on the state set up by HttpStatus.
